column1: Pathardih is a neighbourhood in Dhanbad in Dhanbad Sadar subdivision of Dhanbad district in Jharkhand state
Pathardih is located at 23.67°N 86.43°E﻿ / 23.67; 86.43. It has an average elevation of 143 metres (469 feet).
Note: The map alongside presents some of the notable locations in the area. All places marked in the map are linked in the larger full screen map.
The earlier census town was combined with other urban units to form Dhanbad Municipal Corporation in 2006.Pathardih is part of Ward No. 50 of Dhanbad Municipal Corporation.
